comment: Welcome to Gab ! Just be sure to mute those racist comments that are actually liberals trying to infiltrate and discredit the platform. "This is why we can't have anything nice."

(m / multi-sentence

            :ARG1 (y / you)
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Gab")))
      :snt2 (e / ensure-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (m2 / mute-01
                  :ARG0 y2
                  :ARG1 (c / comment-01
                        :mod (r / racist)
                        :mod (t / that)
                        :ARG0-of (t2 / try-01
                              :ARG1 (a / and
                                    :op1 (ii / infiltrate-01
                                          :ARG0 y2
                                          :ARG1 (p2 / platform))
                                    :op2 (d / discredit-01
                                          :ARG0 y2
                                          :ARG1 p2))
                              :ARG1-of (a2 / actual-02))))
            :mod (j / just))
      :snt3 (c2 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (t3 / this)
            :ARG1 (p3 / possible-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (h / have-03
                        :ARG0 (w2 / we)
                        :ARG1 (a3 / anything
                              :ARG1-of (n2 / nice-01))))))
